role_definition: Fulfillment of an arrangement (such as investment management of a trust fund) on behalf of a customer where the banks acts their trusted proxy and acts in compliance with the specific terms of the fiduciary arrangement
example_of_use: A customer established a fiduciary arrangement with the bank to manage an investment portfolio in accordance with agreed investment guidelines
executive_summary: An agreement where the bank agrees to act on behalf of the customer in a financial matter and in accordance with the agreement terms
